name: Trashier Cashier
description:
How much money can you scam before getting busted?

My first game developed with Unity! Shoutout to Pixabay for a few art assets x)

Trashier Cashier   is a  game where you try to scam as much money as possible by scanning items multiple times. But don't get busted by the customer 'cause then it's game over!

Features:
  • 3 gamemodes:
    • Endless
      • Try to make as much money as you can while not being busted! In this mode you can achieve highscores (accessible via main menu).
    • Trash Cash Hunt
      • Fixed item count in which you have the time to scam as much Trash Cash as possible. No highscores but the scammed value gets added to your balance.
    • Speed
      • Don't let the assembly line come to a stop, otherwise its game over! Assembly line speed is increasing over time.
  • 3 types of customers:
    • Old Man/Old Woman
      • smaller field of view
      • slower in loading the item
    • Man/Woman
      • average field of view
      • average speed in loading
    • Kid
      • big field of view
      • fast in loading
  • Languages:
    • English
    • German
Planned Features:
  • Trash Cash Shop
    • Spend your scammed Trash Cash and  improve your business! Ideas:
      • cashier skins
      • block customer field of view for a few seconds (lights are out, ups...)
      • ...more ideas? Leave them in the comments
  • Paying
    • Would be a simple chance to scam some more money by telling the wrong price -  but if the customer is  observant, you get busted!
    • For example old man has a 30%-chance, woman 50% and kid 70% in which you are busted, otherwise you get more TrashCash!
  • More items
    • Alcohol/Cigarettes
      • Cashier gets busted if sold to kid
    • Toilet paper, washing powder,  bread,  electronical stuff which have a securing and so on..
    • Unscannable items which need to be entered via code in the cashing system
    • ...more ideas? Leave them in the comments
  • Dialogue/Thoughts of customers
  • Ingame pause menu
  • Simple Tutorial
  • Statistics
    • Played games, TrashCash spent, TrashCash  collected,  times getting busted and more...
Participating

  • Write feedback, improvements or ideas    in the comments, would love to hear what you think about my first game!
  •  Search for bugs and let me know - no software is bugfree :D
